example.parse: (IP (NP-ADV (NN 其中)) (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 想) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 回乡))))) (DEC 的)))) (VP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP (CS 虽)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 在) (NP-OBJ (NN 少数))))) (PU ，) (ADVP (AD 但)) (ADVP (AD 常)) (PP-PRP (P 因) (IP (NP-SBJ (NP-PN (NR 坪林)) (NP (NN 生活))) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VA 易))))) (VP (MSP 而) (VP (VV 退却)))))
